about_the_game:
From The Developer
Lot Lizard is not a "sex game." It is NOT made for kids but ... it is far from a porn game. This game is designed to make you laugh. It has a killer soundtrack. It has hilarious dark humor situations. It has tons of content. To add a little spice, it has leaderboards, hidden endings, aliens, mushroom trips, and all sorts of fun stuff to find and mess with. I'm the only dev but I DO listen to the community, make regular updates, and have put my heart into this game. I look forward to seeing you out in the lot.

Lot Lizard
Dive into the world of survival, where the streets hide stories waiting to be unveiled. Lot Lizard is a captivating journey filled with sharp wit, dark humor, and a dash of risqué charm. As a Lizard, you'll navigate through life's twisted paths, where every choice leads to a new path.

Features:
- Wickedly Funny: A narrative steeped in adult humor and clever dialogues that will have you chuckling at the edge of your seat.
- Engaging Clicker Mechanics: Fast-paced gameplay that will test your reflexes and reward your attentiveness.
- Multiple Endings: Your decisions matter, leading to various outcomes and revealing different facets of our characters' lives.
- Rich Storytelling: Embark on a journey with a compelling storyline, where your choices carve the path to redemption or ruin.
- Artistically Enriched: A visual feast awaits, with meticulously crafted artwork setting the scene for our provocative tale.
- Suggestive Yet Svelte: Expect to blush and balk at our game's saucy scenarios, all tastefully handled without explicit content.
- Killer Soundtrack: A fully functional radio with unique stations, DJs, and hours of continuous music.

About The Game:
In Lot Lizard, you're not just playing a game; you're immersing yourself in a story about overcoming adversity, forming unlikely alliances, and challenging societal norms. Our heroine's journey is fraught with peril, humor, and a hint of sexy, ensuring a gaming experience like no other.

Through quick clicks and critical choices, you'll influence her fate and the lives of those around her. Will you guide her to light at the end of the tunnel or down the rabbit hole of despair? The power is in your hands, and every playthrough offers a new twist to her tale.

Join us in Lot Lizard for an adventure that melds the boundaries between right and wrong, humor and gravity, all while keeping you entertained and engaged till the very end. Perfect for those who love their games with a side of sass and a punch of piquancy!

Are You Ready?
Prepare to laugh, ponder, and perhaps even gasp as you explore the vibrant world of **LotLizard**. With each click, you're not just moving forward in the game; you're weaving the fabric of a story rich in drama, comedy, and intrigue. Your journey starts now.

content_descriptors.notes: No nudity or sex is shown in the game, but the game is very sexually suggestive and has drug use and bad situations. I would not want my young kids or yours playing it.

name: Lot Lizard

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-5010U / AMD A8-7600, or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500 / AMD Radeon R5, or equivalent with DirectX 11 support
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This configuration is designed to ensure basic gameplay is enjoyable on lower-end systems. Users with these specifications should expect to run the game with modest settings. Performance and experience may vary, especially with intensive animations.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X, or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon RX 560, 2GB VRAM or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: With these specifications, players should experience smoother animations and overall gameplay. An SSD will greatly improve load times.

short_description: Dive into "Lot Lizard," a unique blend of dark humor and story-driven gameplay. Guide a Lot Lizard through choices and challenges in a world full of adult humor and suggestive themes. Quick clicks reveal secrets and shape destinies in this captivating adventure with multiple happy endings.
